short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website provides impartial coverage of a wide range of UFO topics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The UFOINFO Website provides impartial coverage of a wide range of UFO topics and information for researchers, enthusiasts and those new to the subject.
Often updated, it is the home of Encounters With Aliens On This Day, UFO Roundup, AUFORN Reports and UFO + PSI Magazine and also has archives of Filerâ€™s Files by George Filer, UFO News UK, links and reports from Inexplicata in the Out There, Sightings, and News sections of the site, a large selection of sighting reports from the Oz Files mailing list and much more.
